lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin, a star forward, has filed a letter of resignation with his Russian Super League team, a procedural move necessary for him to sign with the Pittsburgh Penguins and begin his N.H.L. career.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin, a star forward, has filed a letter of resignation with his Russian Super League team, a procedural move necessary for him to sign with the Pittsburgh Penguins and begin his N.H.L. career.
